name: Knight Shift - Chapter 1 Demo
description:
Discover the secrets of the afterlife!

You play as a recently departed Human Soul, who is reborn into a mysterious high-fantasy Kingdom and discovers that the nature of the human soul is not what you had previously thought. It's a little bitta Bleach, maybe a little Konosuba, but it's 100% pretty good.

In an attempt to differentiate Knight Shift from other RPG maker games, every piece of the world which looks interesting is interactive, so be sure to interact with everything - who knows what you could find while rifling through bookshelves or looking in crates? The game also features a ton of placeholder assets, but also original art and music!

A few key features:

  • Hours of story content!
  • Terrible pun-based gameplay!
  • Sidequests upon sidequests!
  • A fully functioning arena to hone your skills!
  • Intense boss battles!
  • Character relationships!
  • Mega-drive inspired soundtrack by @Unthusiasm
  • Traditional JRPG nonsense!

This whole thing started as a writing exercise in my spare time and has rapidly grown into something I've really loved working on. I want to extend a massive thank-you as well to everyone who helped playtest the game to get it this far! Without the balancing and bugfixing you guys helped with, I have no doubt this would be a much worse time.

Travel strange and exotic lands, meet life-long friends, fight vicious creatures and defend the Honeycomb Kingdom! It doesn't always have to suck when you're working the Knight Shift.
